mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stock ( stockCode, stockName, dailyPrice, field, mrktCtg, clpr, vs, fltRt, mkp, hipr, lopr, trqu, trPrc, istgStCnt, mrktTotAmt ) VALUES ( #{stockCode}, #{stockName}, #{dailyPrice}, #{field}, #{mrktCtg}, #{clpr}, #{vs}, #{fltRt}, #{mkp}, #{hipr}, #{lopr}, #{trqu}, #{trPrc}, #{istgStCnt}, #{mrktTotAmt} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE stockName = VALUES(stockName), dailyPrice = VALUES(dailyPrice), field = VALUES(field), mrktCtg = VALUES(mrktCtg), clpr = VALUES(clpr), vs = VALUES(vs), fltRt = VALUES(fltRt), mkp = VALUES(mkp), hipr = VALUES(hipr), lopr = VALUES(lopr), trqu = VALUES(trqu), trPrc = VALUES(trPrc), istgStCnt = VALUES(istgStCnt), mrktTotAmt = VALUES(mrktTotAmt);
